pullRequest.title: NETBEANS-3188 use Apache Maven 3.6.3
pullRequest.bodyText:
Attemp to have last version of maven embedded
I don't understand why licence file contains so much htlm code.
I had duplicate issue. I'm not sure my configuration is ok

nodes.bodyText: This looks strange - if the ignore is needed, it should be present, if it is a comment, please remove it.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -59,11 +59,18 @@ enterprise/web.core.syntax/external/struts-tiles-1.3.10.jar enterprise/web.strut

 groovy/gradle/external/gradle-4.10.2-bin.zip ide/c.jcraft.jsch/external/jsch-0.1.54.jar
 groovy/gradle/external/gradle-4.10.2-bin.zip ide/o.apache.commons.lang/external/commons-lang-2.6.jar
-groovy/gradle/external/gradle-4.10.2-bin.zip java/maven/external/aether-api-1.13.1.jar
-groovy/gradle/external/gradle-4.10.2-bin.zip java/maven.embedder/external/apache-maven-3.3.9-bin.zip
+groovy/gradle/external/gradle-4.10.2-bin.zip java/maven.embedder/external/apache-maven-3.6.3-bin.zip

+
+#
+#gradle-4.10.2/lib/javax.inject-1.jar in groovy/gradle/external/gradle-4.10.2-bin.zip and apache-maven-3.6.3/lib/javax.inject-1.jar in 
+#java/maven.embedder/external/apache-maven-3.6.3-bin.zip are identical
+#gradle-4.10.2/lib/plugins/plexus-cipher-1.7.jar in groovy/gradle/external/gradle-4.10.2-bin.zip and apache-maven-3.6.3/lib/plexus-cipher-1.7.jar in java/maven.embedder/external/apache-maven-3.6.3-bin.zip are identical</failure>

commit.message: NETBEANS-3188 use Apache Maven 3.6.3, license made plain text

afterCommit.message: NETBEANS-3188 use Apache Maven 3.6.3, license made plain text
